resources.string: If you already have a B-schedule account, Sign In:
Free 3 month upgrade to B-schedule Gold for every booking
Feedback for B-schedule for Android, ver
Your B-schedule Gold subscription has been activated
Your B-schedule Gold subscription is not activated: %1$s
You can add flights, hotels, rental cars and more by forwarding your confirmation emails to: trips@bschedule.com
To add a new trip, just forward your travel confirmation emails (flight, hotel, car, etc.) to: trips@bschedule.com
B-schedule will build your itinerary automatically, no matter where you booked.
You may also access and manage your itineraries at www.worldmate.com on your computer.
Love B-schedule ? Give us ★★★★★ rating on %1$s

Please approve opting in to marketing communications from us, so we will be able to occasionally send you relevant updates covering product releases, new features, tips and tricks, hotels deals and other useful information. \n\nYou can fine tune and select specific information you want to receive by changing your subscription preferences on worldmate.com.
Already Booked? Forward your confirmation emails to: trips@bschedule.com
Thank you for booking with B-schedule, in affiliation with Expedia.
Thank you for booking with B-schedule
In order to enjoy the full benefit of B-schedule, all requested permissions are required.\n\nPlease sign up again.
If your flight is delayed, canceled or diverted, B-schedule will push an alert directly to your Android.
Simply forward all your confirmation emails to trips@bschedule.com and receive your itinerary in an organized, easy-to-read view.
Get notified when check-in is available, check-in to your flight directly from B-schedule, have all you travel plans synced to your calendar - and much more.

string.name: jtb_sign_in_active_not_verified_txt
string.Data:
Thank you for creating your B-schedule Account.

Please follow directions found in an email that has been sent to your registered address to verify your account.

If you don’t receive the email, please check your spam or junk mail filter or:

Click here to resend

string.name: jtb_sign_in_active_not_verified_bottom_txt
string.Data: Did you already verify your account? Click here to sign in.

resources.string: Forward your travel confirmation emails to trips@bschedule.com and we’ll take care of the rest.
Managing your trips has never been easier – simply forward your travel confirmation emails to trips@bschedule.com and we’ll take care of the rest.
The all new B-schedule helps you plan, book, and manage your trips better than ever.
Simply forward your confirmation emails to trips@bschedule.com.
